text: Trevor Letowski (born April 5, 1977 in Thunder Bay, Ontario) is a Canadian retired professional ice hockey right winger who played in the National Hockey League with the Phoenix Coyotes, Vancouver Canucks, Columbus Blue Jackets and the Carolina Hurricanes. ==Career statistics== ===Regular season and playoffs=== Regular season Playoffs Season Team League GP G A Pts PIM GP G A Pts PIM
